subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Afflalo took the game’s first shot, a jumper, and hit it, going on to finish 7 of 8 from 3-point range and 14 of 17 from the field on an afternoon when Carmelo Anthony struggled.
snippet: Afflalo took the game’s first shot, a jumper, and hit it, going on to finish 7 of 8 from 3-point range and 14 of 17 from the field on an afternoon when Carmelo Anthony struggled.
